#summary A guide to Haskell source code generated by hprotoc.

= Packages =

= Messages =

Given a message declaration:

{{{
message Foo {}
}}}

hprotoc generates a data type `Foo` with a single record-style constructor. `Foo` is a member of the following standard type classes:
  * `Show`;
  * `Eq`;
  * `Ord`;
  * `Typeable`.
`Foo` is also a member of the following type classes:
  * `Text.ProtocolBuffers.Header.Mergeable` (providing `mergeAppend`);
  * `Text.ProtocolBuffers.Header.Default` (providing `defaultValue`);
  * `[http://hackage.haskell.org/packages/archive/protocol-buffers/latest/doc/html/Text-ProtocolBuffers-WireMessage.html#t:Wire Text.ProtocolBuffers.Header.Wire]`
  * `Text.ProtocolBuffers.Header.MessageAPI`
  * `Text.ProtocolBuffers.Header.GPB`
  * `Text.ProtocolBuffers.Header.ReflectDescriptor`
